member.name: M:Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Agent.GetCurrentSessionsEDocument:E-Document
member.summary: If the current session is a payables agent session, this procedure will return the e-document being processed by the agent.
member.returns: The E-Document being processed by the agent, or an empty record if the session is not from a payables agent.

member.name: O:Table::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Agent KPI
member.summary: A table with the KPI data for the Payables Agent.

member.name: O:PermissionSet::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Ag# - Excluded
member.summary: Permissionset that has the permissions to be excluded from the Payables Agent to ensure no unintended access.

member.name: O:PermissionSet::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Ag# - Run
member.summary: The permissionset that the agent will be assigned to when they are created in the system. This permissionset is used to give the agent access to the pages and actions that are needed to perform their tasks.

member.name: O:Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#PA Setup Configuration
member.summary: To be used as a state variable with the all the related records used to configure the agent.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Agent Setup.LoadSetupConfiguration(Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#PA Setup Configuration@)
member.summary: Retrieves all the records containing setup information for the payables agent.
member.param: State variable where all the setup related information is stored.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Agent Setup.ApplyPayablesAgentSetup(Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#PA Setup Configuration@)
member.summary: Persist the payables agent setup configured across the different records required.
member.param: State variable where all the setup related information is stored.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Agent#PayablesAgent#Payables Agent Setup.GetAgent(Agent@):Boolean
member.summary: Retrieves the agent record if configured in the database, or populates the record with default values.
member.param: Record where the Agent is loaded
member.returns: True if an Agent was found, false otherwise
